name: Bacci Boi
description:
BACCI BOI

Have you ever wanted to just sit back and smoke some tobacco in your living room? Well you've found the right game because that's exactly what you do!

Prepare to sit back and inhale as much as you can to complete all 3 levels for each method of smoking.

Good luck!

Controls:

Spacebar - Smoke

Escape - Return to Menu

Mouse Left Click - Click on UI

Created by:

Leo Laughlin

Michael Moutafis 

Joshua Scott

Assets Used: 

sbaneat(2017), Smoking Sound, Freesound - "Fumar.wav" by sbaneat

GameAudio(2014), Button, Freesound - "Beep Space Button" by GameAudio

Synty Studios, (2018), POLYGON - Town Pack. EpicGames. https://marketplace-website-node-launcher-prod.ol.epicgames.com/ue/marketplace/en-US/product/polygon-town-pack

FX Cat, (2020), Realistic Starter VFX Pack. EpicGames. https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/realistic-starter-vfx-pack
